DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate IOP-lowering efficacy quality life patient use bimatoprost 0.03 % monotherapy versus dual therapy travoprost 0.004 % timolol 0.5 % treatment glaucoma ocular hypertension .
DOC.brief_title: Bimatoprost Monotherapy vs. Dual Therapy With Travoprost Timolol Patients With Glaucoma Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: · Male female > 18 year age Diagnosis primary openangle glaucoma ocular hypertension Untreated IOP > 18 mm Hg eye baseline evaluation Ability provide inform consent likely complete study visit · Known contraindication bimatoprost , travoprost , timolol , component study medication Uncontrolled systemic disease Active ocular disease POAG ocular hypertension Required use ocular medication study medication study ( intermittent use OTC artificial tear product permit ) History intraocular surgery within last 3 month Patient must discontinue use medication include study past reason efficacy intolerance
